720371f-a.text:
169 to 173-177 (only part of which is shown) Henry Street, west of, adjoining, and at the N.W. corner of Jefferson Street, showing the Beth Abraham Chasidim D'S'lonim Synagogue (No. 169). The congregation was organized in 1897 and conducts its services in Hebrew and Yiddish. Shown on the left is a portion of the Rabbi Jacob Joseph School, No. 165-167, a unit of the Synagogue.  June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
720371f-a.folder: Henry Street & Jefferson Street, Manhattan, NY
